short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vavanya Web Scanner is a Browser Extension that allows visual construction of DOM Node identifiers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The current version uses a bottom up strategy to produce XPath identifiers.

Work in progress:
 - CSS selector identifiers
 - Shadow DOM support
 - IFRAME content support
 - Alternative identification strategies (use of sibling and child elementsâ€™ attributes)
